description:
A joint inverse module was developed by imposing structural similarities between different physical parameters and
incorporated into the E4D geophysical simulator, a parallel multi-physics modeling and inversion code with unstructured
tetrahedral mesh. The inversion capability of E4D can accommodate joint inversions of data from two or more geophysical
methods that are available in E4D and is suitable for large scale three-dimensional subsurface characterization or
monitoring. The joint inversion capability were tested using synthetic data from borehole electrical resistivity tomography
and seismic survey.
name: E4D Simulator with Joint Inversion Capability
